This page is only temporary, for until the torrents get put on the main page.

If you're wondering which format you should use, I recommend MP4 for windows and mac (with quicktime) and OGG for linux and ubuntu.

If you need a bittorrent client, deluge and azureus are good choices for ubuntu. To install azureus, just do:
<pre>
sudo aptitude install azureus
</pre>
Or to get deluge in feisty, install <nowiki>[[http://download.deluge-torrent.org/stable/deb/feisty/deluge-torrent_0.5.1-0zachtib1_i386.deb|this package]]</nowiki> (or <nowiki>[[http://download.deluge-torrent.org/stable/deb/feisty/deluge-torrent_0.5.1-0zachtib1_amd64.deb|this]]</nowiki> for AMD64).
or for gutsy, just:
<pre>
sudo aptitude install deluge-torrent
</pre>
To get azureus on windows, go to <nowiki>[[http://azureus.sf.net|their website]]</nowiki>.
